content: first sunrise blanket pattern us terminology general info do you remember the first sunrise you ever saw whether by yourself or with somebody special i believe it was spectacular something special and memorable the pattern first sunrise reminds me of that moment let your creation remind you of that special moment as well the pattern will look gorgeous if you use one solid color ombre or long gradient yarn but you can use any colorway you like this pattern can create any size square blanket but you could also join squares together creating a stunning king size bed cover the pattern is appropriate for intermediate level crocheters the pattern includes detailed descriptions video tutorials of each round pictures of some more complicated parts as well as pictures after each round posted on crochet patterns by bebablanket group on facebook and final result stitches & abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring circle chain/chs chain/chains space/sps space/spaces st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch beg beginning yo yarn over bpslst back post slip_stitch insert hook into top of next st from back to front to back again yo draw yarn back around top of st draw yarn through loop on your hook decrease together number of st worked into different st and finished together single_crochet single_crochet bpsc back post single_crochet insert hook around post of next st from back to front to back again around post of st yo draw yarn back around post of st yo pull through two loops on your hook shallow bpsc shallow back post single_crochet -
